DOC.brief_summary: The investigator include patient attend outpatient clinic area Orthopedics Traumatology hospital diagnosis unilateral Patellofemoral Pain Syndrome . Inclusion criterion : age fifteen thirty-five year , present unilateral PFPS six month evolution , present anterior retro knee pain present undergo two follow activity : squatting , run , kneel , jumping , climb stair ; physically active patient , least thirty minute physical activity least three time per week . Exclusion criterion include patient previous knee surgery , chronic pain one year evolution , pregnancy suspect pregnancy , application intra-articular steroid three month prior evaluation , patient meniscal injury , ligament intra-articular knee structure , degenerative disease diabetes , rheumatoid arthritis , OA knee , hip ankle , history dislocation subluxation patella , Osgood Schlatter syndrome patellar tendinitis quadriceps . The investigator divide patient two group . The control group receive treatment acetaminophen physical therapy rehabilitation , close chain exercise stretch home intend strengthen quadriceps , abductor internal rotators hip duration six week . The experimental treatment group receive plus application technique NUCAP Medical Upper Knee Spider ® Kinesio tap affected knee . Both group evaluate external consultation . They assess Tegner Activity Scale , Kujala score WOMAC visual analog scale ( VAS ) pain assessment ; scale apply begin , third sixth week . The patient experimental group quote week change tape . The control group quote beginning , three week six week . During first appointment take patient anthropometric measurement ( weight , height , BMI ) well general information . Radiographic study ( anteroposterior lateral knee , plus projection Merchant ) seek rule disease see degree contact patella patellofemoral joint . All patient receive explanation illness , booklet require exercise well frequency . For patient include group Spider ® Taping , Kinesio Tape pre-cut strip place inferior head pressure apply , two band place end tape cross edge patella end thigh finish apply moderate tension place , two strip place end edge first second tape without apply pressure . The tape last five day extremity maintain purpose , patient include group summon week remove tape place new one .
DOC.brief_title: Close Kinect Chain Exercise With Kinesio Taping Management Patellofemoral Pain Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Age fifteen thirtyfive year , Presenting unilateral PFPS six month evolution , Presenting anterior retro knee pain present undergo two follow activity : ( squat , run , kneel , jumping , climb stair , physically active patient , least thirty minute physical activity least three time per week . ) Exclusion criterion : Patients previous knee surgery , Chronic pain one year evolution , Pregnancy suspect pregnancy Application intraarticular steroid three month prior evaluation Patients meniscal injury Ligament intraarticular knee structure Degenerative diseases diabetes Rheumatoid arthritis OA knee , hip ankle History dislocation subluxation patella Osgood Schlatter syndrome Patellar tendinitis quadriceps .
